title: OpenAI blocked from using 'Cameo' name amid trademark lawsuit
description: A federal judge in California has blocked OpenAI from using the name "Cameo" in connection with its video generation app Sora, handing celebrity video platform Cameo a preliminary win in a trademark lawsuit against the artificial intelligence giant.
content: Feb 17 (Reuters) - A federal judge in California has blocked OpenAI from using the name "Cameo" in connection with its video generation app Sora, handing celebrity video platform Cameo a preliminary win in a trademark lawsuit against the artificial i... [2188 chars]

title: My vision for AI is sovereignty, inclusivity, innovation: PM Narendra Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi outlines his vision for Artificial Intelligence in a self-reliant India. He emphasizes AI as a force multiplier for global development and human-centric progress. India aims to be among the top three AI superpowers worldwide, focusing on creation and responsible leadership.

title: Hindi and AI: Harmonizing Language for a Developed India 2047
description: The 13th report of the Parliamentary Official Language Committee highlights the integration of Hindi in artificial intelligence and mechanical devices, emphasizing harmony with regional languages. Under 'Developed India 2047,' the report was presented by Union Home Minister Amit Shah to President Droupadi Murmu, focusing on language policy for technological advancement.
